title: Video Converter
description: Convert video files to different formats

upload.title: Drag & Drop your video file here
upload.subtitle: or click to upload
upload.formats: Supports: MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, WEBM, FLV, WMV (Max 500MB)

private.title: 100% Private & Secure
private.description: All video conversion happens locally in your browser. Your videos never leave your device and are not uploaded to any server.

formats.title: Multiple Formats
formats.description: Convert between MP4, WEBM, AVI, and MOV formats. Support for all major video codecs and containers.

quality.title: Quality Control
quality.description: Choose quality settings and resolution. Optimize for file size or video quality based on your needs.

fast.title: Fast Conversion
fast.description: Powered by FFmpeg WebAssembly for fast, efficient video processing directly in your browser.

progress.title: Real-Time Progress
progress.description: See conversion progress in real-time with detailed progress indicators and estimated time.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No watermarks, no limits. Convert unlimited videos with all features completely free.

meta.title: Free Video Converter - MP4, WEBM, AVI, MOV | Online Tools
meta.description: Convert video files between MP4, WEBM, AVI, and MOV formats. Free online video converter with resolution and quality control. 100% private, browser-based.
